coreAttributes.name: Woolly Goodness
coreAttributes.description: A large serving of fluffy candy floss, covered in a type of protective cellophane wrapper and skewered by a wooden stick. A label on the plastic packaging bears the brand name 'Wooly Goodness', and displays a naked sheep-girl happily presenting herself to the viewer.
coreAttributes.applyEffects:
[##npc.incrementHealth(npc.getAttributeValue(ATTRIBUTE_HEALTH_MAXIMUM)/10)]

[npc.Name] [npc.verb(start)] to feel a lot healthier...

[#npc.addPotionEffect(ATTRIBUTE_MAJOR_PHYSIQUE, 2)]

useDescriptions.selfUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the candy floss out of its protective packaging and quickly [npc.verb(devour)] it, leaving [npc.herHim] with the delicious taste of sweet, sugary goodness filling [npc.her] mouth.
useDescriptions.otherUse: [npc.Name] [npc.verb(take)] the candy floss out of its protective packaging, before bringing it up to [npc2.namePos] [npc2.lips] and getting [npc2.herHim] to eat it. Quickly devouring it, [npc2.name] is left with the delicious taste of sweet, sugary goodness filling [npc2.her] mouth.
